title: HelloMonster
content:
Fucking Monster,
Hello,Monster.You know me?I know you ,you make me have a good time for a long time.Of course,not just me.
I have no lanaguages to describle you.I just hope you can appearance.But this dream always can’t achive.
It doesn’t matter.I will found the resolution to resolve you.You,just for wait.
In the end,writing this article just for my hobby.
